ModMetaData.name: Call of Cthulhu - Elder Things (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Jecrells mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=882126182
- This is an unofficial port - This will be removed when/if Jecrell comes back - Added Empire relation-patch - Forbid Brawler-trait as they have no melee-weapons to use
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/CallofCthulhuElderThings][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [h1]Adds a new playable race: The Elder Things.[/h1] [h1]Adds a new scenario for The Elder Things.[/h1] [h1]Adds a new faction limited to frozen regions.[/h1]
The Elder Things, escaping the Shoggoth rebellion, took to sailing through space to escape their own creations. Now they populate the rim. However, while they are often incredibly intelligent and durable, they require slave labor to tend to their needs.
[h1]**WARNING** [b]REQUIRES HUMANOID ALIEN RACES 2.0[/b] Please put Humanoid Alien Framework 2.0 ABOVE Elder Things. Also, disable race mods that are not updated with the Humanoid Alien Framework 2.0.[/h1]
Join our Discord if you have any bugs / questions. http://discord.gg/ePKnqwR
Artwork for The Elder Things was done by [b]spoonshortage[/b]. Check out more of her mods here: https://steamcommunity.com/id/spoonshortage/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100
Pssst. Still here? If you enjoy my work, why not buy me a coffee sometime? Cthulhu's blessings! https://www.patreon.com/jecrell
